title: GD which Adult Swim cartoon should I watch next
body:
Today I finished Rick & Morty's amazing 2-season-long show (+ the comics) and while I wait for the next season I'd easely have enough time to get into at least one new cartoon
I was thinking about the Venture Bros, but it's probably just because I don't really know what other show they made.
You guys got any suggestions?
To be fair it doesn't have to be made by adult swim, but I'd like to avoid cartoons with like 20 30-episode long seasons. You get what I mean.
Uhhh... Yeah. And maybe not something too serious either. I don't know, man. Show me what you got.
